QuestData.Title: The Battle for Broken Shore
QuestData.Description:
Your warship awaits at the end of the dock, $n. May your weapon bring you many kills today.
The Warchief has already made landfall, I will wager you will simply need to follow the trail of demon blood.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take Captain Russo's ship to the Broken Shore.

Objectives.Objective: Ship taken to the Broken Shore
